      • getDemographicsAdvanced

        public Demographics getDemographicsAdvanced(DemographicsAdvancedRequest demographicsAdvancedRequest)
                                     throws ApiException
        Demographics Advanced Endpoint Demographics Advanced Endpoint will return the aggregated values of the selected demographics variables of the regions falling inside a user provided geometry or travel time/distance boundaries. All the intersecting demographic boundaries will be snapped completely, and user will have option to request these boundaries in response.
        Parameters:
        demographicsAdvancedRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        Demographics
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • getDemographicsBasicCall

        public okhttp3.Call getDemographicsBasicCall(java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String longitude,
                                             java.lang.String latitude,
                                             java.lang.String searchRadius,
                                             java.lang.String searchRadiusUnit,
                                             java.lang.String travelTime,
                                             java.lang.String travelTimeUnit,
                                             java.lang.String travelDistance,
                                             java.lang.String travelDistanceUnit,
                                             java.lang.String travelMode,
                                             java.lang.String country,
                                             java.lang.String profile,
                                             java.lang.String filter,
                                             java.lang.String includeGeometry,
                                             ApiCallback _callback)
                                      throws ApiException
        Build call for getDemographicsBasic
        Parameters:
        address - Address to be searched (optional)
        longitude - Longitude of the location (optional)
        latitude - Latitude of the location (optional)
        searchRadius - Radius within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 52800 Feet or 10 miles (optional)
        searchRadiusUnit - Radius unit such as Feet, Kilometers, Miles or Meters (optional)
        travelTime - Travel Time based on ‘travelMode’ within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 1 hour. (optional)
        travelTimeUnit - minutes,hours,seconds,milliseconds. Default is meters.Default is minutes. (optional)
        travelDistance - Travel Distance based on ‘travelMode’ within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 10 miles. (optional)
        travelDistanceUnit - feet,kilometers,miles,meters. Default is feet. (optional)
        travelMode - Default is driving. (optional)
        country - 3 digit ISO country code (Used in case address is mentioned). (optional)
        profile - Applicable on ranged variables. Returns top sorted result based on the input value. (optional)
        filter - If Y, demographic boundaries are returned in response. (optional)
        includeGeometry - (optional)
        _callback - Callback for upload/download progress
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • getDemographicsBasic

        public Demographics getDemographicsBasic(java.lang.String address,
                                         java.lang.String longitude,
                                         java.lang.String latitude,
                                         java.lang.String searchRadius,
                                         java.lang.String searchRadiusUnit,
                                         java.lang.String travelTime,
                                         java.lang.String travelTimeUnit,
                                         java.lang.String travelDistance,
                                         java.lang.String travelDistanceUnit,
                                         java.lang.String travelMode,
                                         java.lang.String country,
                                         java.lang.String profile,
                                         java.lang.String filter,
                                         java.lang.String includeGeometry)
                                  throws ApiException
        Demographics Basic Demographics Basic Endpoint will return the aggregated values of the selected demographics variables of the regions falling inside the search radius. All the intersecting demographic boundaries will be snapped completely and user will have option to request these boundaries in response.
        Parameters:
        address - Address to be searched (optional)
        longitude - Longitude of the location (optional)
        latitude - Latitude of the location (optional)
        searchRadius - Radius within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 52800 Feet or 10 miles (optional)
        searchRadiusUnit - Radius unit such as Feet, Kilometers, Miles or Meters (optional)
        travelTime - Travel Time based on ‘travelMode’ within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 1 hour. (optional)
        travelTimeUnit - minutes,hours,seconds,milliseconds. Default is meters.Default is minutes. (optional)
        travelDistance - Travel Distance based on ‘travelMode’ within which demographics details are required. Max. value is 10 miles. (optional)
        travelDistanceUnit - feet,kilometers,miles,meters. Default is feet. (optional)
        travelMode - Default is driving. (optional)
        country - 3 digit ISO country code (Used in case address is mentioned). (optional)
        profile - Applicable on ranged variables. Returns top sorted result based on the input value. (optional)
        filter - If Y, demographic boundaries are returned in response. (optional)
        includeGeometry - (optional)
        Returns:
        Demographics
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

        travelTimeUnit - minutes,hours,seconds,milliseconds. Default is meters.Default is minutes. (optional)

        travelDistanceUnit - feet,kilometers,miles,meters. Default is feet. (optional)
        travelMode - Default is driving. (optional)
        country - 3 digit ISO country code (Used in case address is mentioned). (optional)

      • getDemographicsByAddressCall

        public okhttp3.Call getDemographicsByAddressCall(java.lang.String address,
                                                 java.lang.String country,
                                                 java.lang.String profile,
                                                 java.lang.String filter,
                                                 java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                                 java.lang.String variableLevel,
                                                 ApiCallback _callback)
                                          throws ApiException
        Build call for getDemographicsByAddress
        Parameters:
        address - The address to be searched. (required)
        country - 3 letter ISO code of the country to be searched.Allowed values USA,CAN,GBR,AUS. (optional)
        profile - Retrieves the sorted demographic data on the basis of pre-defined profiles that can display the top 3 or top 5 results (by location) either in ascending or descending order.Allowed values Top5Ascending,Top5Descending,Top3Ascending,Top3Descending (optional)
        filter - The 'filter' parameter retrieves the demographic data based upon specified input themes. (optional)
        valueFormat - The 'valueFormat' parameter is applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - The 'variableLevel' retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value (optional)
        _callback - Callback for upload/download progress
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • getDemographicsByAddress

        public Demographics getDemographicsByAddress(java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String country,
                                             java.lang.String profile,
                                             java.lang.String filter,
                                             java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                             java.lang.String variableLevel)
                                      throws ApiException
        Demographics By Address. Provides the demographic details around a specified address. GeoLife 'byaddress' service accepts address as an input to return a specific population segment's age group, ethnicity, income, purchasing behaviour, commuter patterns and more.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to be searched. (required)
        country - 3 letter ISO code of the country to be searched.Allowed values USA,CAN,GBR,AUS. (optional)
        profile - Retrieves the sorted demographic data on the basis of pre-defined profiles that can display the top 3 or top 5 results (by location) either in ascending or descending order.Allowed values Top5Ascending,Top5Descending,Top3Ascending,Top3Descending (optional)
        filter - The 'filter' parameter retrieves the demographic data based upon specified input themes. (optional)
        valueFormat - The 'valueFormat' parameter is applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - The 'variableLevel' retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value (optional)
        Returns:
        Demographics
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

        Parameters:
        address - The address to be searched. (required)

        profile - Retrieves the sorted demographic data on the basis of pre-defined profiles that can display the top 3 or top 5 results (by location) either in ascending or descending order.Allowed values Top5Ascending,Top5Descending,Top3Ascending,Top3Descending (optional)
        filter - The 'filter' parameter retrieves the demographic data based upon specified input themes. (optional)
        valueFormat - The 'valueFormat' parameter is applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - The 'variableLevel' retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value (optional)
        _callback - The callback to be executed when the API call finishes

      • getDemographicsByBoundaryIdsCall

        public okhttp3.Call getDemographicsByBoundaryIdsCall(java.lang.String boundaryIds,
                                                     java.lang.String profile,
                                                     java.lang.String filter,
                                                     java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                                     java.lang.String variableLevel,
                                                     ApiCallback _callback)
                                              throws ApiException
        Build call for getDemographicsByBoundaryIds
        Parameters:
        boundaryIds - Accepts comma separated multiple boundary ids. (optional)
        profile - Applicable on ranged variables. Returns top sorted result based on the input value. (optional)
        filter - Accept the comma separated theme names and filter response based on value. Maximum 10 can be provided. (optional)
        valueFormat - Applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - Retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value. (optional)
        _callback - Callback for upload/download progress
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • getDemographicsByBoundaryIds

        public Demographics getDemographicsByBoundaryIds(java.lang.String boundaryIds,
                                                 java.lang.String profile,
                                                 java.lang.String filter,
                                                 java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                                 java.lang.String variableLevel)
                                          throws ApiException
        Demographics By Boundaryids. This endpoint will allow the user to request demographics details by census boundary id. Multiple comma separated boundary ids will be accepted.
        Parameters:
        boundaryIds - Accepts comma separated multiple boundary ids. (optional)
        profile - Applicable on ranged variables. Returns top sorted result based on the input value. (optional)
        filter - Accept the comma separated theme names and filter response based on value. Maximum 10 can be provided. (optional)
        valueFormat - Applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - Retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value. (optional)
        Returns:
        Demographics
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

        public ApiResponse<Demographics> getDemographicsByBoundaryIdsWithHttpInfo(java.lang.String boundaryIds,
                                                                          java.lang.String profile,
                                                                          java.lang.String filter,
                                                                          java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                                                          java.lang.String variableLevel)
                                                                   throws ApiException
        Demographics By Boundaryids. This endpoint will allow the user to request demographics details by census boundary id. Multiple comma separated boundary ids will be accepted.
        Parameters:
        boundaryIds - Accepts comma separated multiple boundary ids. (optional)
        profile - Applicable on ranged variables. Returns top sorted result based on the input value. (optional)
        filter - Accept the comma separated theme names and filter response based on value. Maximum 10 can be provided. (optional)
        valueFormat - Applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - Retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value. (optional)
        Returns:
        ApiResponse<Demographics>
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body

      • getDemographicsByLocationCall

        public okhttp3.Call getDemographicsByLocationCall(java.lang.String longitude,
                                                  java.lang.String latitude,
                                                  java.lang.String profile,
                                                  java.lang.String filter,
                                                  java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                                  java.lang.String variableLevel,
                                                  ApiCallback _callback)
                                           throws ApiException
        Build call for getDemographicsByLocation
        Parameters:
        longitude - Longitude of the location. (optional)
        latitude - Latitude of the location. (optional)
        profile - Retrieves the sorted demographic data on the basis of pre-defined profiles that can display the top 3 or top 5 results (by location) either in ascending or descending order.Allowed values Top5Ascending,Top5Descending,Top3Ascending,Top3Descending (optional)
        filter - The 'filter' parameter retrieves the demographic data based upon specified input themes. (optional)
        valueFormat - The 'valueFormat' parameter is applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)
        variableLevel - The 'variableLevel' retrieves demographic facts in response based on the input value (optional)
        _callback - Callback for upload/download progress
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • getDemographicsByLocation

                                              java.lang.String latitude,
                                              java.lang.String profile,
                                              java.lang.String filter,
                                              java.lang.String valueFormat,
                                              java.lang.String variableLevel)
                                       throws ApiException
        Demographics By Location. Provides the demographic details around a specified location. GeoLife 'bylocation' service accepts longitude and latitude as an input to return a specific population segment's age group, ethnicity, income, purchasing behaviour, commuter patterns and more.
        Parameters:
        longitude - Longitude of the location. (optional)
        latitude - Latitude of the location. (optional)

        valueFormat - The 'valueFormat' parameter is applicable for few ranged variables where percent & count both are available and filter response based on the input value. (optional)

      • getSegmentationByAddress

        public Segmentation getSegmentationByAddress(java.lang.String address,
                                             java.lang.String country)
                                      throws ApiException
        Segmentation By Address. Provides the segmentation details around a specified address. GeoLife 'Segmentation by Address' service accepts address as an input to return the lifestyle characteristics of households in terms of their family status, children characteristics, income behaviors, financial preferences and interests.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to be searched. (required)
        country - 3 letter ISO code of the country to be searched.Allowed values USA,CAN,GBR,FRA,ITA,AUS,DEU. (optional)
        Returns:
        Segmentation
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body
